content.text:
# 34th Gawad Urian Awards

| site = Marriott Hotel, Pasay City
| host = Cesar Montano, Ai-Ai delas Alas & Butch Francisco
| best_picture = Ang Damgo ni Eleuteria
| most_wins = Ang Damgo ni Eleuteria (4)
| most_nominations = Amigo  (10)
| last = 33rd
| next = 35th
}}
The 34th Gawad Urian Awards () is held on May 17, 2011. Established in 1976, the Gawad Urian Awards highlights the best of Philippine cinema as decided by the Filipino Film Critics. The best Philippine films for the year 2010 are honored in a ceremony at the Marriott Hotel in Pasay City. The Lifetime Achievement Award (Natatanging Gawad Urian Award) is conferred to screenwriter Jose "Pete" Lacaba.
Winners and nominees
wins the Actor of the Decade recognition for his work during the 2000s.]]
is one of the two recipients of the Actress of the Decade recognition for her stellar body of work.]]
Winners are listed first and bolded.
